user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, breathable underwear that would provide full coverage and prevent any discomfort throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for underwear that would keep me comfortable throughout the day, especially in terms of breathability and fit. The soft fabric and design promised to prevent any discomfort like sagging or bunching, which was a significant concern for me. The emphasis on comfort and the tag-free feature were also appealing, as I wanted something that would feel good against my skin.

I needed a reliable option for everyday wear that would not show under my clothes. The breathable cotton and X-Temp cooling feature were important for my comfort, especially during warmer days. The promise of a no-show look and the value of getting a 6-pack made this choice practical and appealing.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-made, and true to their descriptions, particularly in terms of fit and color. I value items that offer a good balance of quality and affordability, and I appreciate when products are designed with breathability and softness in mind. Additionally, I tend to favor items that provide a sense of durability and longevity, as well as those that come with a guarantee or promise of quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor quality, such as those that fade quickly or have unpleasant odors. I also find overly snug fits uncomfortable and prefer items that allow for ease of movement and comfort.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Boxer Briefs, Cool Dri Moisture-Wicking Underwear, Cotton No-Ride-up for Men, Multi-Packs Available> / Item ID: B0BH113WW9 / Price: $25.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from 100% cotton that's soft and breathable for everyday comfort (heathered styles are a cotton-rich blend). Our moisture-wicking underwear is designed with Cool Comfort® fabric that helps keep you cool no matter what your day brings. Our experts also designed these men's underwear with no-ride-up construction and a Comfort Flex® waistband that stretches and moves with you. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort® fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxers 5-Pack, Cotton Knit Comfortable Boxer Underwear, Moisture-Wicking Cotton Boxers Multipack> / Item ID: B09J24M56M / Price: $20.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxers'] / Description: ["Think of everything you love about your softest tee and imagine how that would feel in ultra-comfortable cotton knit boxers. Here they are from Hanes® with comfort in every detail. Soft and breathable, these basic knit boxers are made from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. These cotton boxers enhance comfort further with the ComfortFlex® stretch logo waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. Another detail of comfort designed into Hanes® T-shirt-soft knit underwear is the tagless styling which means no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. You'll also appreciate the button fly that stays smooth and the convenience of a 5-pack for stock-up ease."]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Fresh & Dry Light and Moderate Period 3-Pack Brief Underwear, Multiple Options Available> / Item ID: B0BGLP14S4 / Price: $15.72 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['At last, the freedom and confidence to go anywhere and do anything without worrying about leaks, odor or bulk. Hanes®\' COMFORT, PERIOD.™ briefs are made for moderate period protection, as well as life\'s other "oops" moments, from sneezing to laughing to coughing to exercising. Whether you need extra leak protection with your pad or tampon or are looking for postpartum underwear, our tagless period underwear for women and teens has you covered. The experts at Hanes® have designed them with an absorbent, multilayer stain-guard liner that holds liquid and neutralizes odors. Best of all, you can toss them in the washer and wear them over and over, like any underwear. This black brief 3-pack has brief-style legs, and full-coverage in front and back for sleek smoothness without bulk. The moisture-wicking fabric is stretchy, comfortable, and so comfortable you\'ll forget how superbly these period panties perform. To top it off, they\'re tagless for itch-free comfort. A customer favorite, the leak-protection performance of these absorbent period briefs in an all-black will free you from thinking about embarrassing leaks, on light days, not-so-light days, or any days.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."]
